messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Rue's book was: Re: second generation was ap and unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... we find it once it is published?  Has she published before? **I guess I ll jump in here .  Hi, I m Rue :0) (that s my first name - my last name s
messages.messageBody:
>>Is Rue the first or last name? Does her book have a title? Where might
we find it once it is published? Has she published before?


**I guess I'll jump in here <G>. Hi, I'm Rue :0) (that's my first name - my
last name's Kream). I have two daughters, Dagny, who's 12, and Rowan, who's
8. This is my first book, and it is called Parenting A Free Child: An
Unschooled Life. It is being published by Unbounded Publications
(http://www.ubpub.com/). I'm not sure when it will be out. ~Rue

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Rue's book was: Re: second generation was ap and unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Is Rue the first or last name?  Does her book have a title?  Where might we find it once it is published?  Has she published before? Thanks. Deborah ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Is Rue the first or last name? Does her book have a title? Where might we find it once it is published? Has she published before?

Thanks.
Deborah
----- Original Message -----
From: kbcdlovejo@...
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2005 8:06 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Rue's book was: Re: second generation was ap and unschooling


In a message dated 2/17/2005 10:19:11 AM Eastern Standard Time, "kayb85" <sheran@...> writes:

She read several pages of Rue's book, though, and said she wished
>RUE were HER mother! <G> Maybe she's not totally hopeless! <G>
>
>What's Rue's book?<<<<<<<

Rue is working on a new unschooling book. It should be published very soon.

Kind of a question-and-answer book of gentle, mindful parenting and unschooling philosophies. Y'all are going to love it!

I'm also giving Rue pointers on how to plug her new book at every single opportunity! <G>

*OR* I'll do it *for* her! <G>

~Kelly
